name: Team Tac Bomb
description:
TEAM TAC BOMB IS A 4 PLAYERS LOCAL CO-OP PLATFORMER GAME 💣💣💣💣💣💣💣💣💣💣

You and your friends play little bombs that work to bring a coffin to its grave.
But the coffin must never fall and you are about to explode ! 

💣💣💣💣💣💣💣💣💣💣 Laura Mas Maury - Game Designer David Du - Developer/Sound Designer Alexandre Le Van - Game Designer/Sound Designer Enriqué Egido - Game Designer  Matthieu Manuellan -  Developer
 François Dessarts - Developer
 Victor Mauduy - Artist
 Philippe Grazina - Artist
